alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 13 at 11:39PM EST until December 15 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible, including significant freezing rain. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Pocahontas, Southeast Pocahontas and Southeast Randolph Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph
